channel.title: Posts on Biranjan
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Biranjan

item.title: How I made my personal finance dashboard
item.description: Once in a while I like to know how am I doing with my expenses but my bank doesn’t provide any application where I can break down my expenses. However, my bank does provide a financial statement albeit in a not so helpful .txt format.

item.title: Interactive time-series plots in R
item.description: Plotting Time Series Object There are lots of good plotting packages in R. And in this post I would like to show some of the interactive charting libraries to plot time series in R. If the object that you are trying to plot is a time-series object then one can plot it really easily. lungDeaths <- cbind(mdeaths, fdeaths) str(lungDeaths) ## Time-Series [1:72, 1:2] from 1974 to 1980: 2134 1863 1877 1877 1492 .

item.title: Getting Started with Hugo and blogdown in GitHub
item.description: When I wanted to start a blog in git-hub first I thought Jekyll was the only option. Although Jekyll is natively supported by git-hub however it is not the only static site that git-hub can handle.
